mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry_reply (inquiry_id, admin_id, answer) VALUES (#{inquiryId}, #{adminId}, #{answer})
mapper.select: SELECT id, inquiry_id AS inquiryId, admin_id AS adminId, answer, replied_at AS repliedAt FROM inquiry_reply WHERE inquiry_id = #{inquiryId}
mapper.update: UPDATE inquiry_reply SET answer = #{answer}, replied_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE inquiry_id = #{inquiryId}
